name: That High Guy
description:
Join a teenager trying to escape from a strange town with weird events...

This 3D-Game is all about losing control in a trippy world full of drugs and strange events...

Collect all drugs....

Hope you like it

Controls:

- W/A/S/D to move

- Mouse to look around

- Click on the shiny drugs to collect them

- Find all drugs to proceed

This Project was created in 48 hours in the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

No code was written before the period. All arts are from the "POLYGON - City Pack" and "POLYGON - Town Pack". The Map is also not a Prefab.

Music by LuKremBo

thx to Maxmurks

Discord: Plixo#7800

YT: Plixo
